data.name: CTRL Phreak Demo
data.detailed_description:
Explore a vast network of stolen data, encrypted chatrooms, and backdoor connections as you traverse a shrouded corner of the web only the most elite hackers are able to access. At the end of it all lies The Mainframe, the highest security target known to hacker-kind.

Download RAM and unlock unique Frameworks to grow more powerful on your quest through the Deep Web. Fight elite hacker bosses gatekeeping Access Points to deeper levels of the Internet.

Engage in high-octane, keyboard-mashing, hacker-to-hacker combat. Make choices that matter via a retro cyber terminal interface. Can you reach the bottom of the Internet and achieve immortal hacker glory?
data.about_the_game:
Explore a vast network of stolen data, encrypted chatrooms, and backdoor connections as you traverse a shrouded corner of the web only the most elite hackers are able to access. At the end of it all lies The Mainframe, the highest security target known to hacker-kind.

Download RAM and unlock unique Frameworks to grow more powerful on your quest through the Deep Web. Fight elite hacker bosses gatekeeping Access Points to deeper levels of the Internet.

Engage in high-octane, keyboard-mashing, hacker-to-hacker combat. Make choices that matter via a retro cyber terminal interface. Can you reach the bottom of the Internet and achieve immortal hacker glory?
data.short_description: A hacking roguelike that has you furiously typing the way "hackers" do in movies. Hack your way through the Deep Web to reach The Mainframe, fighting off black hat hackers and sentient AI along the way. Can you make it to the bottom of the internet and achieve immortal hacker glory?
